text: brrda rx sul khxng phwk khea klaw kæ phwk khea wa “phwk rea michı xun dı nxkcak pen puthuchn yeiyng phwk than tæthwa xallxhˌ thrng pordpran phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh cak pwng baw khxng phraxngkh mi bangkhwr kæ rea thi ca na hlakthan ma sædng kæ phwk than wentæ doy xnumati khx ngxallxhˌ theanan læa dæ xallxhˌ theanan br rda muxˌ mi nphu ngm xb khwam wi wangcı theid
